import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' const Orders = () => { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]) const[adminId, setAdminId] = useState(localStorage.getItem('adminId')) useEffect((ad) => { fetch(`/admins/${adminId}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data) setOrders(data.requested_items) }) },[]) return (

Order Requests

{orders.map((order) => ( ))}
Item Quantity Clerk Date
{order.item_name} {order.quantity} {order.clerk_name} {order.date}
) } export default Orders
